name: Trimbo
description:
Welcome to Trimbo, the tree limbo, where naughty squirrels and other forest creatures are sent to atone for their misdeeds. Here you meet Yggdrasil, your guide. Find spirits lost in the dark and return them to Yggdrasil so they may move on. Your adventure is fraught with peril, though; malevolent spirits abound, and leaving Yggdrasil's light means the darkness threatens to swallow you.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost and Found

Created by:

Matt Pistella

Lyndsay Pistella
